title: New Taric Skin
body: I don't know about you guys but I think Taric needs a new skin. I cant even remember last time Taric got one. He is an awesome champion and defiantly deserves a new skin. Like maybe a pool party skin or something cool.

replies.body: Taric isn't going to get a new skin until after his visual update is taken care of because his model is so old and out-dated. I think a pool party skin would be neat on Taric though!
Yup! That's correct. He's currently in the process of a pretty big update. Once he gets his new look for his base - we'll be able to give him a new look in terms of skins!
Speaking of Taric skins and getting a reworked base, I *desperately* hope the fuzzy pink leg warmers on Fifth Age are staying.
